name: Depper and Depper
description:
Yeah, you read it right, DEPPER AND DEPPER (no that’s not a typo), Is Tavern Tale’s very stupid entry to Ludum Dare #48, theme Deeper and Deeper (yeah we know…)

Depper and Depper is a point and click puzzle game where the player must navigate through a computer interface, managing an ever-growing collection of windows, e-mail tabs and internet bullshit, diving ever deeper into stupid conspiracies and internet culture in this stylized pixel-art computer interface game, in order to discover THE TRUTH behind the disappearance of famous Hollywood actor, Mr. J. Depp (completely fictional character). Untangle a web of mysteries and idiotic internet conspiracies, and uncover the terrifyingly stupid truth.
